text: The Principality of Arbër, also known as Arbanon or Arbëria, was the first Albanian state. It existed during the Middle Ages. It was formed around 1190. The Principality ended in 1255. ==References== Category:History of Albania Category:1190s establishments in Europe Category:13th-century disestablishments Category:Former countries in the Balkans
title: Principality of Arbër
